high_descs: Go left and face the dresser with the mug and other items on it.
Pick the pen up that is on the edge of the dresser.
Put the pen in the white mug.
Pick the mug up from the dresser.
Go left and turn to face the brown shelves.
Put the white cup on the shelf.
anns.task_desc: Put a cup with a pencil in it on the shelf.

high_descs: Move to the end table under the mirror
Pick up a pen from the table
Put the pen in a cup on the table
Pick up the cup with the pen from the table
Move to the shelf to the left
Put the cup on the shelf
anns.task_desc: Put a cup with a pen inside on the side to the left of the mirror.

high_descs: turn to the left and take a few steps forward and turn to the right and go to the dresser
pick up the right pen from the dresser
put it in the white coffee mug
pick up the white coffee mug with the pen in it
turn to the left and take a few steps forward and turn to the right facing the book case
put the mug with the pen in it on the empty shelf below the books
anns.task_desc: Place a mug with a pen in it on a book case shelf
